name: Don't Stop The Party
description:
Don't Stop The Party!

Our entry for the Brackey's 2020.2 Game Jam.  Play as boombox and fend off robots who want to stop your party.  Be careful though, you only have so many notes and you have to rewind your tape to recollect them.  

Made by Chris Dahrens and John Kiser

Made using Unity, Blender, Ableton Live 10, and Photoshop.
